title: La Siesta
description: In many parts of Spain, people take a midday break called a siesta to rest or nap.

title: Tapas Culture
description: Spaniards often eat small plates called tapas while socializing with friends.

title: Flamenco Music
description: Flamenco is a passionate music and dance style from southern Spain.

title: Spanish Bullfighting
description: Though controversial, bullfighting has been a part of Spanish culture for centuries.

title: La Tomatina
description: An annual tomato-throwing festival held in Buñol, Spain.

title: Late Meals
description: Spaniards typically eat dinner much later than in other countries, often after 9 PM.

title: Spanish Architecture
description: Spain is known for its unique blend of Gothic, Moorish, and Modernist architecture.

title: Spanish Language Diversity
description: Spain has several co-official languages including Catalan, Galician, and Basque.

title: Semana Santa
description: Holy Week is celebrated with religious processions and festivals across Spain.

title: Spanish Soccer Passion
description: Soccer is a huge part of life, with clubs like FC Barcelona and Real Madrid.
